author: realbigsean
content:
Running into a couple issues trying out some of the tests in the interop repo https://github.com/Inphi/eip4844-interop

`CAPELLA_FORK_EPOCH` is set to `3` but `CAPELLA_FORK_VERSION` isn't configured, not sure if the intent here is disable to fork or not?

I'm peering a prysm node with a lighthouse node and at epoch three, it looks like prysm continues producing bellatrix blocks, then in the 4844 fork the withdrawals fields aren't present in blocks (seems like the rebase on top of capella changes aren't there)
